name: Latest Post Link Shortcode
author: Sommie Njoku

sections.description:
This plugin creates a shortcode for you to turn your last WordPress post into a link. You can add this shortcode to your any link field or URL field in the post editor.

Simply use shortcode [latestposturl] in your post editor to link to the latest post on your blog/website. This shortcode works on popular post editors like the Classic Editor, Gutenberg Editor as well as third-party page builders like Elementor and Visual Composer.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the latest-post-shortcode-link.zip file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Extract the zip file
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. In your post editor, simply use a shortcode widget with shortcode [latestposturl] to create a link to the latest post on your blog/website.
  5. Enjoy!
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial plugin release.

2.0

  • Updated plugin for WordPress 6.1.1.
  • Extended compatibility for popular page builders that support shortcakes including Elementor, Bricks, Divi, WP Bakery (Formerly Visual Composer).

2.2

  • Updated plugin for compatibility with WordPress 6.2.2
